title: Ranger
content:
verse the wilds with their timeless weapon of choice - the bow and arrow. In Baldur's Gate 3, Rangers are able to take a step further, mastering their control over wild beasts, completing their skills of the hunt, and even tempering themselves in the darkest environments, eventually learning how to go beyond the material and cast specialized Spells.

Rangers have their own list of Spells and Features accessible to them through leveling up the character. They have the option to choose their path
